Free Video Game Rentals

Description: Rent a video game console and a game for an extra fun social with friends! If you’re looking for a new game for your own device, why not try it out first by renting it for a week? With over 100 options to choose from, you’re bound to find a new game you enjoy!

Instructions:You can rent a console, like a Wii or Switch, or or a video game through the Jones media website online. You can may need to scroll down to the bottom of the Equipment page for the specific console you would like to rent. To see the avalible video games for a specific console, you can filter the results in the ‘Genre’ catagory.

Location: Place a reservation online (sign in via Dartmouth account). Pick up/drop off @ Jones Media Center.

Limits: 3 day rental period for consoles. 7 day rental period for video games.

Contact: Jones Media Center
